remarks: Kelley's choice, most common form: compactness of a product of knob topologies recovers choice.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
statement:
kelac2.s $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> S e. V ) $.
kelac2.z $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> S =/= (/) ) $.
kelac2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( Xt_ ` ( x e. I |-> ( topGen ` { S , { ~P U. S } } ) ) ) e. Comp ) $.
kelac2 $p |- ( ph -> X_ x e. I S =/= (/) ) $.
$d I x $.
$d ph x $.
